overview: As the Civil War spills our nationâ€™s blood, Capt. John Hayes (Randolph Scott) fights on a vital but little-known battlefront. He aims to ship gold to Union banks through a small Colorado town, defying Southern sympathizers who aim to stop him at any cost.
tagline: Hellbound for Vengeance for the Flaming Redhead Who Betrayed Him!
title: Westbound
